snippet: From school officials, parents and police, a clearer picture is emerging of the scene inside the school; to keep children calm, some teachers sang songs, others handed out lollipops.
abstract: Scene inside Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Conn, after gunman Adam Lanza began firing is pieced together from numerous interviews with school officials, police and parents; authorities reveal that Lanza had hundreds of unspent rounds, raising the prospect that had he not killed himself as the police approached, the number of victims could have been far higher than 26.

byline.original: By SAM DOLNICK and MICHAEL WILSON

lead_paragraph: From school officials, parents and police, a clearer picture is emerging of the scene inside the school; to keep children calm, some teachers sang songs, others handed out lollipops.

headline.seo: Amid the Whiz of Bullets, Seeking Comfort in Song
